mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE id=#{id} and status !=0
SELECT DISTINCT o.id as oid, o.uid, o.status, o.date AS odate, s.name AS sname, s.logo AS slogo FROM orders o JOIN shop s ON o.sid = s.id WHERE o.uid=#{uid} ORDER BY o.date DESC

select distinct o.id as oid, o.addr, o.addrd, o.phon, o.nick, o.date as odate, o.status, o.ask, de.id as deid, de.mnid as mid, de.mname, de.num as mnum, de.price as mprice, d.opid, d.oname AS opname, d.oprice AS opprice, s.name as sname, s.logo as slogo from orders o join detail de on o.id = de.odid join dopt d on de.id=d.did JOIN shop s ON o.sid = s.id where o.id=#{oid};
select distinct de.id as deid from orders o join detail de on o.id = de.odid where o.id=#{oid};
select id as deid, mnid as mid, mname, price as mprice, num as mnum from detail where id=#{deid};
select de.id as deid, d.opid, d.oname AS opname, d.oprice AS opprice from orders o join detail de on o.id = de.odid join dopt d on de.id=d.did where de.id=#{deid};
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET uid=#{uid}, sid=#{sid}, addr=#{addr}, addrd=#{addrd}, phon=#{phon}, nick=#{nick}, ask=#{ask} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE orders SET status=0 WHERE id=#{id}
